page.title: 05HOME LIFE A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
{ { A day in my life by Louise age 7 I get up and put on a flowery skirt, a checked blouse and jumper and my shoes then I have my breakfast. I get ready to catch the bus.I pick up my satchel and coat. Then Dad takes us to the bus. When we get to school we have a play then I go inside. Mrs Sharp does the register _ 17 people are here today. We do our maths then we have prayers. In prayers we had a story and a song and said a prayer. We go out to play then we do some copy_writing. We sing with Mrs Clark. After we had finished we went to lunch.After lunch we went to play. When we came in we played rounders. After rounders we went out to play then we had a story and we went home.
{ }
